Title: Long Halter Evening Dress

Featured-image: CR107-black-long-halter-evening-dress_p.jpg

----

Description: A line silhouette with a halter top. The top of the gown is shining with sequins and rhinestones. The high neckline is studded with the sequins and the architectural design is blocked into lined pattern. The full length skirt sweeps into a small train.
